body:
While installing OCE-0.18.1 on OpenSUSE Tumbleweed, it fails

```
     337   In file included from /tmp/praveen/spack-stage/spack-stage-oi6nni/oce-OCE-0.18.1/src/Standard/Standard_CLocaleSentry.cxx:16:0:
  >> 338   /tmp/praveen/spack-stage/spack-stage-oi6nni/oce-OCE-0.18.1/src/Standard/Standard_CLocaleSentry.hxx:39:12: fatal error: xlocale.h: No such file or directory
     339      #include <xlocale.h>
     340               ^~~~~~~~~~~
     341   compilation terminated.
```

xlocale.h seems to be removed in glibc-2.26 which is what I have.
title: OCE fails due to missing xlocale.h
